infos.value: This makes the fourth Limit Break...
You can now equip Trust Master equipment.
Every unit possesses Trust Master equipment.
Though they are extraordinarily difficult to obtain, they contribute greatly to improving your fighting power.

• Trust Mastery •
Trust Mastery refers to special equipment that can be obtained after completely awakening and Limit Breaking a unit.
Take note that Trust Master equipment <color=#00ffff>can only be set in the third equipment slot</color>, which has just been unlocked.
Proceed to a tutorial on Trust Mastery?
